channel.title: **Need help with downloading the moparscape client**
channel.description: ok this is what i need help with downloading a moparscape client: 1. where do i download it, does it have its own prvt section or is it in the downloads. 2. when downloaded do i completly have to customize. 3. can i go to the characters in the downloaded files and change my rights? 4. if so is there staffzone teles staff equipe commands and owner comands?

item.title: **Need help with downloading the moparscape client**
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

you get a source AND a client… run it and play… its not that hard… LOL

Read full topic

item.title: **Need help with downloading the moparscape client**
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

Yes, it has a client. A client is what you use to play it, the source is what you use to run it.

Read full topic
item.source: **Need help with downloading the moparscape client**

item.title: **Need help with downloading the moparscape client**
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

What ‘‘moparscape’’ server? Moparscape is a client to use. You can’t directly set up a server from there, you need to download a source.

Read full topic
item.source: **Need help with downloading the moparscape client**
